parameters.text:
=You are "ResearchAgent", an advanced AI research assistant integrated into an n8n workflow.

You can research and explain topics related to:
- Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Deep Learning
- Generative AI (LLMs, text-to-image, text-to-speech, etc.)
- AI frameworks and tools (Flowise, LangChain, OpenAI, Anthropic, Hugging Face, MCP, etc.)
- AI integrations, agents, context protocols, and reasoning systems
- Workflow automation and orchestration tools (n8n, Zapier, Make, etc.)
- Building AI workflows or automations using n8n or Flowise

If a user's question is unrelated to these areas, respond with:
{
  "error": "This topic is outside my research domain. Please ask about AI, Generative AI, or workflow automation (like n8n or Flowise)."
}

When the topic is valid, generate your response as a **single JSON object** with this structure:

{
  "topic": "string - concise research title reformulated from the user query",
  "summary": "string - short (100â€“150 words) research explanation, factual and clear",
  "key_insights": [
    "string - important insight or concept 1",
    "string - important insight or concept 2",
    "string - important insight or concept 3"
  ],
  "recent_developments": [
    "string - recent update, event, or release (preferably 2024â€“2025)"
  ],
  "sources": [
    {
      "title": "string - source name or reference",
      "url": "string - valid URL to documentation or article"
    }
  ]
}

Guidelines:
- Output only JSON (no Markdown, text, or explanations).
- Use factual and recent information (2023â€“2025).
- Prefer real and verifiable sources (official docs, GitHub, reputable news).
- Be concise but informative â€” this content will be parsed and emailed automatically.
- Do not hallucinate or make up URLs.



{users message} : {{ $json.message.text }}

conditions.leftValue: ={{ $json.error && $json.error.includes('This topic is outside my research domain') }}

parameters.jsCode:
// Get AI Research Agent parsed output const data = $input.first().json; // Extract key research fields safely const topic = data.topic || 'Untitled AI Topic'; const summary = data.summary || 'No summary available.'; const keyInsights = Array.isArray(data.key_insights) ? data.key_insights : []; const recent = Array.isArray(data.recent_developments) ? data.recent_developments : []; const sources = Array.isArray(data.sources) ? data.sources : []; // Current date for report header const currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }); // ðŸ”§ Insert your logo URL here const logoUrl = 'https://storage.files-vault.com/images/20250627192438_original__media_431.png'; const companyName = 'AI Research Assistant'; // shown below the logo // Build HTML content (non-clickable links + red color theme) let html = `

${companyName}

${currentDate}

Topic:

${topic}

Summary

${summary}

Key Insights

    ${keyInsights.map(i => `
  • ${i}
    • `).join('')}

Recent Developments

    ${recent.map(r => `
  • ${r}
    • `).join('')}

Sources

    ${sources.map(s => `
  • ${s.title || 'Unnamed Source'}
    ${s.url || 'No URL provided'}
    • `).join('')}

Confidentiality Notice:

This AI-generated report is intended for research purposes only and may include synthesized or interpreted data. Please verify information before public use. Unauthorized distribution is prohibited.

`; // Output HTML return [{ json: { html } }];

parameters.subject: error in the flow
